data.title: Weather in Novosibirsk in february: Temperature, Rainfall, Sunshine... for February 2025! - Russia
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Novosibirsk (in Russia) in february good? Discover the weather forecast in february 2025 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Novosibirsk in february: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Novosibirsk?

Weather in Novosibirsk in february 2025

The weather in Novosibirsk in february comes from statistical datas on the past years. You can view the weather statistics for the whole month, but also by using the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Novosibirsk in february

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Novosibirsk in february.

The climate of Novosibirsk in february is very bad

The climate in february in Novosibirsk is relatively dry (with 41mm of rainfall over 3 days). It should be noted an improvement from the previous month since in january it receives an average of 42mm of rainfall over 2 days.

The climate is very cold in this city the month of february. Do not forget to cover yourself!. Temperatures are up to -11°C. The seasonal minimum is -18°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of february in Novosibirsk is -15°C. Note that seasonal normals are in contrast with those observed in Novosibirsk in the month of february with a maximum record of 1°C in 2015 and a minimum record of -40°C in 2019.

On average, in Novosibirsk, the days of february last 09:43. Sunrise is at 08:51 and sets at 18:34.

Weather data for Novosibirsk in february:

Weather data for Novosibirsk for february are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Novosibirsk. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Novosibirsk can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Novosibirsk.
